amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title II for the Army National Guard for operation and maintenance, up to $7,500,000 may be available to renovate and repair existing barracks at Camp Perry, Port Clinton, Ohio.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4867 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd.
